data.message: OMG. I love FACEBOOK but I can't agree that it's good to see this creep on here. He's worthless and he's done very little for our country. I still CAN"T believe he was re-elected. Heaven Help Us !!!

replies.message: Maybe u should. Go to hell
Blanca Mancilla, you're just adding to the problem. Stooping to her level so to speak. Not very bright, lol
He has brought Medicare to people who need it and found and eliminated Osama bin laden. Thats just the tip of the iceberg.  Look back and find all the good things he's done
Carol Lasko - Calling our president a creep - You should be shame of yourself!!!  Your comment is despicable!!!
Oh my God. Is God hiring!
click unlike and you'll be in your fairy land' Of hate"
double like what you said! Carol Lasko.
99.99999 % of Americans HATE this  Traitor !! Nice move FakeBook !!!!!

I've read so many times the election was rigged. That's why we need to show ID when we vote. So people don't vote more than once, so  illegals can't vote, and the big favorite here in Louisiana.......so dead people can't vote! Oh yes, it's true. The dead get out to vote. It's a proven fact. It's how Senator  Mary Landrieu got elected in the first place. The names of the dead were printed in a newspaper!  Politics as usual in Louisiana. This is why Democrats won't pass voter ID laws. Sad. If Hillary wins, you can be sure it won't be honestly.
